titles.title: I Was No Prophet, Neither Was I A Prophet's Son

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I was no prophet, neither was I a prophet's son
I was a herdsman and a gatherer of fruit
And the Lord took me, as I followed the flock
And the Lord said unto me
Go prophecy unto my people, Israel
Go prophecy unto my people, go thou now and tell
There's a famine coming upon the earth
And it's not of bread and it's not of thirst
There's a famine coming upon the earth
It's of hearing the words of the Lord.
